thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: Joe Kirby
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por Joe Kirby

author: Joe Kirby
title: Joe Kirby
text: Myself & my wife have used Centauro a total of eight times in Spain. They are a good company with good quality cars at good prices. They are very helpful when you are checking your car for damage, scratches etc. I will be using them again for our next trip in Spain.
